text: "Om igen", written by Ingela 'Pling' Forsman and Bobby Ljunggren, is a ballad in Swedish, performed by Swedish pop singer Lena Philipsson at the Swedish Melodifestivalen 1988. "Om igen" finished second. The single peaked at #10 at the Swedish singles chart. The song was also at Svensktoppen for 12 weeks during the period 10 April-4 September 1988, with a second place during the debut week as best result there. It also became a Svensktoppen hit, being at the list for 12 weeks during the period 10 April-4 September 1988, peaking at #2. The song won the 1988 Second Chance Contest. Kikki Danielsson was asked to compete with "Om igen", but said no.Kikki Danielsson - Fri - en samling - 2001. ==Chart positions== {| class="wikitable" !align="left"|Chart (1988) !align="center"|Peak position |- |align="left"|Sweden |align="center"|10 |} ==References== Category:Lena Philipsson songs Category:Melodifestivalen songs of 1988 Category:Songs written by Bobby Ljunggren Category:Songs with lyrics by Ingela Forsman Category:Swedish-language songs Category:1988 songs
title: Om igen
